page.title: 07HOLM EVANGELICAL CHURCH
page.content:
This church was started in 1982 by a group of Christians living in the Holm area. The building once belonged to nearby Drumdevan House (which has beautiful peacocks roaming around) and was used as stables. Later, it was an architect's office and house and today it is a church and Christian Centre.
We saw the{MOTHERS AND TODDLERS {GROUP}where we counted 16 babies of 2 years old and under with their mothers. Some were playing with toys while others were sleeping in their prams. We had juice and biscuits.
There were only 12 present at the first adult service in 1982. Today over 90 regularly attend and plans are being considered to build a bigger church.
